description: Server entry point for handling HTTP requests in a Remix-run application, with functions to handle requests from browsers and bots, setting CORS headers, managing streaming server-side rendering, and responding accordingly.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Handles incoming HTTP requests, adding CORS headers, checks if the request is from a bot or browser, and calls appropriate handler functions.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests, streaming the content back to the client using React's renderToPipeableStream.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests, streaming the content back to the client.
